program.name: tk
program.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11.[23]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-freebsd*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; x86_64*-linuxe4) ARGS="--x-libraries=/usr/X11R6/lib64 --enable-threads" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -nodtk -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CPPFLAGS="-DFUNCPROTO=1"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; esac

module.name: default
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11.[23]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-freebsd*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; x86_64*-linuxe4) ARGS="--x-libraries=/usr/X11R6/lib64 --enable-threads" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -nodtk -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CPPFLAGS="-DFUNCPROTO=1"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; esac
module.configure:
cd unix PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig}:\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ ${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+-I${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_INC}} \ ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" --enable-shared \ tcl_cv_cc_visibility_hidden=no \ --with-tcl="${SB_BUILD_BASE}/tcl8.5.10/unix" ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
# Modify TK_CC_SEARCH_FLAGS and TK_LD_SEARCH_FLAGS with path to tk # for use when linking with other applications ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!RUNTIME_DIR}!RUNTIME_DIR}:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_TCL_LIB}!" config.status sh config.status
module.install:
gmake -C unix install
# Fix runtime path to tk shared library case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in hppa*-hpux*) (cd unix rm wish gmake TCL_LIB_SPEC="-L${SB_VAR_TCL_LIB} -ltcl8.5" \ TK_BUILD_LIB_SPEC="-L${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} -ltk8.5" wish) ${SB_PATH_INSTALL} -m 755 -o root -g 0 unix/wish \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/wish8.5 ;; esac

module.name: 64bit
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -q64 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1" BINDIR="bin/ppc64" LIBDIR="lib/ppc64" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" BINDIR="bin/hpux64" LIBDIR="lib/hpux64" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" BINDIR="bin/pa20_64" LIBDIR="lib/pa20_64"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-hpux11.31) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.31" ;; *-hpux11.23) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.23" ;; *-hpux11.11) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.11" ;; *-hpux11.00) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.00" ;; esac ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -64 -mips4 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" BINDIR="bin/mips4" LIBDIR="lib64" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=opteron -m64 \ -xarch=sse2" BINDIR="bin/amd64" LIBDIR="lib/amd64" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic -xarch=v9" CPPFLAGS="-DFUNCPROTO=1" BINDIR="bin/sparcv9" LIBDIR="lib/sparcv9" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic -m64 \ -xarch=sparc" BINDIR="bin/sparcv9" LIBDIR="lib/sparcv9" ;; esac
module.configure:
cd unix PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+${SB_VAR_LIBTTF}/${LIBDIR}/pkgconfig}:\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE+${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE}/${LIBDIR}/pkgconfig}" \ ${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${SB_VAR_LIBTTF+-I${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_INC}} \ ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" --enable-threads --enable-64bit \ --bindir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${BINDIR}" \ --libdir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}" \ --mandir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/man" \ --with-tcl="${SB_BUILD_BASE}/tcl8.5.10/unix" ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
# Modify TK_CC_SEARCH_FLAGS and TK_LD_SEARCH_FLAGS with path to tk # for use when linking with other applications ${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!RUNTIME_DIR}!RUNTIME_DIR}:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}:\ ${SB_VAR_TCL}/${LIBDIR}!" config.status sh config.status
module.install:
if [ ! -d ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/64 ]; then ln -s ./$(basename ${BINDIR}) ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/64 fi if [ ! -d ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ]; then case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*|*-hpux*|*-solaris*) ln -s ./$(basename ${LIBDIR}) ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ;; *-irix*) ln -s ../lib64 ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64 ;; esac fi
gmake -C unix install-binaries
module.uninstall:
rm ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${BINDIR}/wish8.5
rm -rf ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}/tk8.5 rm ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}/libtk8.5.s[lo] \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}/libtkstub8.5.a \ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR}/tkConfig.sh
rmdir ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/${BINDIR} rm ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/bin/64
rmdir ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/${LIBDIR} && rm ${INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/64
:

module.name: static
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11.[23]*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-hpux11*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-freebsd*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentium4 -march=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; x86_64*-linuxe4) ARGS="--x-libraries=/usr/X11R6/lib64 --enable-threads" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -nodtk -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CPPFLAGS="-DFUNCPROTO=1"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis"
ARGS="--enable-threads" ;; esac

module.name: 64bit-static
module.script-header:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc_r CFLAGS="-O2 -q64 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1" BINDIR="bin/ppc64" LIBDIR="lib/ppc64" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" BINDIR="bin/hpux64" LIBDIR="lib/hpux64" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 +Olit=all +Ofltacc +Oentrysched +DD64 \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" BINDIR="bin/pa20_64" LIBDIR="lib/pa20_64"
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-hpux11.31) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.31" ;; *-hpux11.23) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.23" ;; *-hpux11.11) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.11" ;; *-hpux11.00) ARGS="--host=hppa64-hp-hpux11.00" ;; esac ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -64 -mips4 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" BINDIR="bin/mips4" LIBDIR="lib64" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=opteron -xarch=amd64" BINDIR="bin/amd64" LIBDIR="lib/amd64" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xO2 -xtarget=generic -xarch=v9" CPPFLAGS="-DFUNCPROTO=1" BINDIR="bin/sparcv9" LIBDIR="lib/sparcv9" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic -m64 \ -xarch=sparc" BINDIR="bin/sparcv9" LIBDIR="lib/sparcv9" ;; esac

item.para: [3223850] ttk button state disabled during click
[3291543] mem corrupt when [$canvas dchars] removes all coords of a polygon
[2358545] Restore "08" in spinbox configured with -from and -to
[2902573] Update Safe Tk to new Safe Base
entry validation compat with Itcl scope
[3053320] update Ttk to tile 0.8.6 feature set
prevent delete of selected folder in Win dialog
[873608] win tearoff menu, no submenu arrows
[2809525] prevent X crash on overlong color name
[2891541] fix grab behaviour for main window
[2116837] std virtual events with Caps Lock

note.para: The default Tcl module search path directories are:
The default search path is set by the TCLLIBPATH environment variable. The executable wrapper for wish8.5 sets the variable to the paths above.
The following 3rd-party modules are available: BWidget, Tktable, tix, tkcon.
Tkcon, available as ${SB_INSTALL_BASE}/tk85p/bin/tkcon8.5, contains a more feature-rich replacement for the wish shell.
